name: Formation Zenika
description: Display a list of the next Zenika formation.

props.name: titleMessage
props.description: Title message. If it contains {agency}, it will be replaced by the agency name.

props.name: displayTime
props.description: Number of seconds before switching selection.

props.name: locale
props.description: Langage to use for the date.

props.name: dualpane
props.description: If the display should be single pane or dual pane.

props.name: selectedColor
props.description: The color that will be used to highlight the currently displayed formation.
